title: Omicron COVID-19 variant detected in 5 states, a day after first case was reported in U.S.
content:
1. Omicron COVID-19 variant detected in 5 states, a day after first case was reported in U.S.  CBS News
  2. Omicron coronavirus variant found in multiple US states  Yahoo News
  3. Omicron confirmed in man who attended NYC anime convention  PIX11 News
  4. Latest on Omicron Variant and Covid-19: Live News  The New York Times
  5. Editorial: Omicron is here, just in time for the holidays. But don't panic.  Houston Chronicle

localize.title: オミクロン・COVID-19バリアントが5つの州で検出される、米国で最初の症例が報告された翌日に
在美国报告首例病例一天后，在5个州检测到Omicron COVID-19变体。
在美國報告首例病例一天後，在5個州檢測到Omicron COVID-19變體。
